articles.content: Right-handed batter Virat Kohli has been in sublime form in the ongoing T20 World Cup, registering three half-centuries. He played a match-winning knock of 82 runs against Pakistan, guiding India to … [+1548 chars]

articles.title: Adventurous So Goes Undefeated, Leads 3-1 - Chess.com
articles.description: GM Wesley So gained a commanding two-point lead in the Chess.com Global Championship final, winning twice with white and drawing both games with black. Despite playing more adventurously than usual, sacrificing in nearly every game, So went undefeated―outplay…
